description: Why we waiting here in the Big Bad Battle Base and not over there fighting the baddies?! Wait I got an idea, take the Big Bad Battle Base into the Baddy Base!
tooltip: Why we waiting here in the Big Bad Battle Base and not over there fighting the baddies?! Wait I got an idea, take the Big Bad Battle Base into the Baddy Base! (Big Bad Battle Base can now unpack in enemy territory)
